apache-certificate.description: SSL Certificate used by the server. By appending to it CA certificate it is possible to use this field to replace not implemented apache-ca-certificate. Deprecated, please use master-key-upload-url.
apache-certificate.title: [DEPRECATED] SSL Certificate, with optional CA certificate

apache-key.description: SSL Key used by the server. Deprecated, please use master-key-upload-url.
apache-key.title: [DEPRECATED] SSL Key

authenticate-to-backend.description: If set to true the frontend certificate will be used as authentication certificate to the backend. Note: backend might have to know the frontend CA, available with 'backend-client-caucase-url'.
authenticate-to-backend.title: Authenticate to backend

backend-client-caucase-url.title: Backend Client Caucase URL
backend-client-caucase-url.description: URL of the backend client caucase.

backend-connect-retries.description: Amount of retries to connect to the backend. The amount of backend-connect-timeout*backend-connect-retries seconds will be spent to connect to the backend.
backend-connect-retries.title: Amount of retries to connect to the backend.

backend-connect-timeout.description: Time in seconds for establishing connection to the backend.
backend-connect-timeout.title: Timeout for backend connection (seconds)

backend-haproxy-statistic-port.title: Backend Haproxy Statistic Port
backend-haproxy-statistic-port.description: Port number for the backend haproxy statistics server.

ciphers.title: Ordered space separated list of ciphers

disk-cache-size.title: Default size of disk cache on each node (bytes)
disk-cache-size.description: The value can be provided with suffix 'K', 'M', 'G'

domain.description: Domain used to generate automatic hostnames for slaves. For example 'example.com' will result with slave hostname 'slaveref.example.com'.
domain.title: Domain

enable-http3.title: Enable HTTP3
enable-http3.description: Globally enable HTTP3 protocol. Can be precisely set on each node by -frontend-i-config-enable-http3

expert-backend-allow-downgrade-ssl.title: Expert Backend Allow Downgrade SSL
expert-backend-allow-downgrade-ssl.description: Allow SSL downgrade for backend connections (expert setting).

extra_slave_instance_list.title: Extra Slave Instance List
extra_slave_instance_list.description: JSON string containing a list of additional slave instances to be added to the default slave list.

http3-port.title: Real advertised HTTP3 port
http3-port.description: As most common deloyment is using iptables for port redirection and in case of udp it is advertising to the process it's bind port instead of the really connected to, it's required to manually set this port for the whole cluster. Can be precisely set on each node by -frontend-i-config-http3-port

kedifa-caucase-url.title: KeDiFa Caucase URL
kedifa-caucase-url.description: URL of the caucase service for KeDiFa certificate management.

master-key-download-url.title: Master Key Download URL
master-key-download-url.description: URL for downloading the master key from the KeDiFa server.

monitor-cors-domains.title: Monitor CORS domains
monitor-cors-domains.description: List of cors domains separated with space. Needed for ajax query on this monitor instance from a different domain.

monitor-httpd-port.title: Monitor HTTPD Port
monitor-httpd-port.description: Port number for the monitor HTTP server.

monitor-password.title: Monitor password
monitor-password.description: Password used for basic auth in monitoring web server

monitor-username.title: Monitor username
monitor-username.description: Username used for basic auth in monitoring web server

plain_http_port.title: Plain HTTP Port
plain_http_port.description: Port number for plain HTTP connections.

ram-cache-size.title: Default size of RAM cache on each node (bytes)
ram-cache-size.description: The value can be provided with suffix 'K', 'M', 'G'

re6st-verification-url.description: Url to verify if the internet and/or re6stnet is working.
re6st-verification-url.title: Test Verification URL

request-timeout.title: HTTP Request timeout in seconds. Warning: Changing the parameter will lead to trafficserver service restart.

rotate-num.title: Rotate Number
rotate-num.description: Number of log files to keep before rotation.

backend-haproxy-http-port.title: Backend Haproxy HTTP Port
backend-haproxy-http-port.description: Port number for the backend haproxy HTTP server.

backend-haproxy-https-port.title: Backend Haproxy HTTPS Port
backend-haproxy-https-port.description: Port number for the backend haproxy HTTPS server.

slave-introspection-https-port.title: Slave Introspection HTTPS Port
slave-introspection-https-port.description: Port number for the slave introspection HTTPS server.

slave-kedifa-information.title: Slave KeDiFa Information
slave-kedifa-information.description: JSON string containing KeDiFa configuration information for each slave instance.

trafficserver-introspection-port.title: Trafficserver Introspection Port
trafficserver-introspection-port.description: Port number for the trafficserver introspection server.

xlog-fluentbit-forward-host.title: Fluentbit Xlog forwarding address
xlog-fluentbit-forward-host.description: Address of remote Fluentd or Fluentbit server to which Fluentbit should forward Xlog data

xlog-fluentbit-forward-port.title: Fluentbit Xlog forwarding port
xlog-fluentbit-forward-port.description: Port of remote Fluentd or Fluentbit server to which Fluentbit should forward Xlog data

xlog-fluentbit-forward-shared-key.title: Fluentbit Xlog forwarding shared key
xlog-fluentbit-forward-shared-key.description: Secret key shared with remote Fluentd or Fluentbit server for authentication when forwarding Xlog data
